mapper.sql: id, device_id, device_name, creator_id, create_date, group_id
mapper.insert:
insert into xm06_t_device
id,
device_id,
device_name,
creator_id,
create_date,
group_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update xm06_t_device
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update xm06_t_device set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select u.id, u.user_name, u.true_name, u.email, u.phone, u.create_date, u.update_date, u.is_valid from xm06_t_user u where u.id = #{userId}

select d.* from xm06_t_device d where d.device_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{deviceId}, '%') AND d.device_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{deviceName}, '%') AND d.creator_id = #{creatorId} AND d.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY create_date DESC
SELECT d.* FROM xm06_t_device d ORDER BY create_date DESC
